Hellplague/ Malice::

Hellplague noticed Celeron's un ease with the
situation.

"Let me handle this. Just don't get overly nervous and
accidently shoot someone."

As they made their approach, she saw none other than
Malice and the little femme, Wolfblade.  Suprise,
suprise.  They looked rater happy, it made her worry
for her dear sister.  She slowed down and decended,
and treansformed back to robot mode, looking at the
Maximal representatives.

"I take it you two are the ones sent to meet us?  How
is my sister?" she asked without introduction, hoping
to convey her urgency in the matter.

--- rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> Celeron looks around for Hellplague.  He not sure
> what was going on.


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
